name: Marincess Circulation
effectText: Target 1 WATER Link Monster you control; return it to the Extra Deck, and if you do, Special Summon 1 "Marincess" Link Monster from your Extra Deck with the same Link Rating but a different name, but it cannot attack directly or be destroyed by battle this turn. (This is treated as a Link Summon.) If you control a Link-3 or higher "Marincess" monster, you can activate this card from your hand.
